talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>Hee-hee!<sp:5:0:0> I'm waiting for Sasan.


We promised that we would meet up here.
talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Wakeup>Time sure flies when you're enjoying
great conversation. Before I knew it,
the sun had set.
Good night!
talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Finley... Our adventure at Tarm Point was
unforgettable, wasn't it?

I have some other great stories from the
trip as well.<sp:5:1:0> Would you like to hear them?
talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Urgh... I'm having so much trouble
writing this.
talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Yes, of course! <sp:5:0:0>I love listening to your
stories, Sasan.
talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Wow... How amazing!


The sludge that was on the statue is
gone!<sp:5:1:0> There was so much there, it seems
nearly impossible!
talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Yes, Sasan! Why are you bringing him up?
Do you have news?!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>I guess it's because I mentioned
him, huh? 

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Sasan is my best friend and favorite
person.<sp:5:0:0> He's Hylian and a traveling
merchant. Pretty neat, right?
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>We made a promise that, no matter what
transpired, we would always meet up here
in Zora's Domain on a certain day.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Sasan always keeps his promises.
However, this time...

That day has already come and gone,
and still no sight of him.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>He still hasn't arrived...<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>That's why I decided to write him a letter.
<sp:5:0:0>After all, I must do something!
talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Tee-hee! <sp:5:0:0>I'm so relieved that the statue is
clean now!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you so much!
talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Happy_00>I'm so worried about Sasan, I can hardly
stand still!
talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Yes, Sasan.<sp:5:1:0> He's my best friend and
favorite person. <sp:5:1:0>He's also a Hylian,
like you.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>However... <sp:5:1:0>Since the sludge showed up,
he hasn't been showing up in the domain
on the day he promised he always would.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Nothing like this has ever happened
before, so I'm quite worried.

It's too dangerous to leave because
everything is covered in sludge.<sp:5:1:0> Urgh...<sp:5:0:0>
I guess I'll have to wait here a bit longer.
talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Sasan, how wonderful it would be<sp:5:0:0> if you
could stay here in the domain forever.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Then again, if you did that, I wouldn't be
able to hear your stories about your
adventures and the other places you visit.
talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare_00>So much sludge...<sp:5:0:0>


I don't know if I can take it anymore.
talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>What in the world?!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0301>I thought that I could escape my restless
thoughts by walking.

Before I knew it, I was going around
in circles.

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>This spot...


<sp:3:0:2:0301>This is where Sasan and I would come to
talk for hours.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Cry_00>Urgh... <sp:5:1:0>*sniffle*<sp:5:0:0> I'm so worried about
you, Sasan...
talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Haha, <sp:5:0:0>that's true.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>It would be amazing if we could go on an
adventure together one day, Finley!
talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>I could ask, "Sasan, are you doing well?"
Oh, but what if he isn't?

<snd:TalkPositive_01>How about, "Sasan, are you alive?"<sp:5:0:0>
Ah, but that's very rude if he isn't.
talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I found a lake under this dizzyingly high
cliff in Rito Village, <sp:5:0:0>and so I tried closing
my eyes and jumping in.
talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>I tried my best to withstand the heat in
the Goron Hot Springs,<sp:5:0:0> until it got so hot,
I could practically boil an egg in there!
talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>So! A Hylian was able to make it to the
domain. That's encouraging.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>But then...you are very special, Link.<sp:5:1:0>
Sasan is not, um...special in that
same way.
talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>There was an incredible sand shroud
blowing around in Gerudo Town.<sp:5:0:0>
It really roughed me up!
talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>I'm writing a letter to someone important
to me.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>It's for Sasan. <sp:5:1:0>He's a Hylian who is very
dear to me.
talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I walked through the sludge and climbed
over stones...<sp:5:0:0><sp:5:0:0> I did whatever I had to so
that I could make it to Zora's Domain.
After all, I promised you that I would swim
and climb and lift and do all sorts of
things to try to build up my muscles.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0301>I couldn't swim the rivers though...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>Sasan, that's amazing!<sp:5:0:0> Please, tell me all
about your adventures!
talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That's right.<sp:5:0:0> Sasan is important to me.<sp:5:0:0>
He's my best friend and favorite person!

<sp:3:0:2:0301>I was kind of a loner before I met him.<sp:5:0:0>
My family and friends stay pretty busy.

<sp:3:0:2:0501>That's why I sent a letter drifting down
the river.<sp:5:0:0> I wanted to connect with
someone.
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>The rest, as they say, is history. <sp:5:0:0>I got a 
response, <sp:5:0:0>and it was from Sasan!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Ever since, he's always kept the promise
we made to meet up in the domain on a
certain day, no matter what transpired.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>However, this time is different. The
promised day has come and gone, and
Sasan never appeared.
I'm so worried.<sp:5:0:0> I want to go and search
for him, but...<sp:5:0:0>with the sludge, I know it
would worry my mother sick if I left.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>She asked me to try writing a letter
instead. I hate that it's so reasonable,
I had to comply.
talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>Hee-hee! <sp:5:0:0>I'm off to finally meet up
with Sasan.

I'm sure we'll speak at length to make up
for the time we lost <sp:5:0:0>because of that
horrible sludge.
